title: Drawing, 1954-23-40, ca. 1848
description: More than two repeats, showing red roses on a blue ground framed in brown scroll enframement, set against a dark red ground with other stylized foliate motifs.  Squared off (in pencil) for transfer.  Signed, right margin (in ink) "Livre en toute Propriete a Mssrs. Reguillart et Boupel at Aouguet (?) / Paris le 2 Decembre 1848 Virolet.
